title: Clinical Practice Competency Enhancement: Designing Mathematics Learning Strategies with Web 2.0 Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can document and share math problem-solving processes using Web 2.0 tools (blogs, cloud notes, collaboration platforms).
Learners can compare their understanding of mathematical concepts with peer learners using online survey tools.
Learners can create and utilize digital content (images/videos) for mathematical communication in a mobile-optimized Web 2.0 environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
